articles.content: The Lake Victoria of today is relatively young at just 16,000 years old, but within this tiny timeframe, some 500 different species of cichlid fish have managed to evolve here. Remarkably, this explo… [+4415 chars]

articles.title: Mercury: shrinking planet is still getting smaller – new research - The Conversation
articles.description: Mercury has shrunk by7 km. Most of this happened long ago, but now we have evidence that it continues.
articles.content: Planetary scientists have long known that Mercury has been shrinking for billions of years. Despite being the closest planet to the Sun, its interior has been cooling down as internal heat leaks away… [+6267 chars]
